NOTO Botanics Deep Serum

Brand: NOTO Botanics

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Sclerocarya Birrea (Marula) Seed Oil, Rosa Canina (Rose Hip) Fruit Oil, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn) Oil, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Seed Oil, Daucus Carota (Carrot) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Extract, Helianthus Annus (Sunflower) Seed Oil,

Oil, Citrus Paradisi (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Seed Oil, Daucus Carota (Carrot) Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Extract, Helianthus Annus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Citral, Limonene, Linalool.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
